revised_title: Fertility and Factors Affecting Sheep Breeds
tldr: This article examines the fertility rates and factors affecting different breeds of sheep. It demonstrates that fertility is a racial characteristic and can be influenced by various factors such as the condition of the sheep, the management of the flock, and the local environment. The study highlights the importance of understanding these factors to improve the fertility and overall health of sheep breeds.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Animal Reproduction
